awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 5 wins & 24 nominations.

fullplot: A doctor becomes obsessed with having a sexual encounter after his wife admits to having sexual fantasies about a man she met and chastising him for dishonesty in not admitting to his own fantasies. This sets him off into unfulfilled encounters with a dead patient's daughter and a hooker. But when he visits a nightclub, where a pianist friend Nick Nightingale is playing, he learns about a secret sexual group and decides to attend one of their congregations. However, he quickly learns he is in well over his head and finds he and his family are threatened.
plot: A New York City doctor, who is married to an art curator, pushes himself on a harrowing and dangerous night-long odyssey of sexual and moral discovery after his wife admits that she once almost cheated on him.
title: Eyes Wide Shut

tomatoes.consensus: Kubrick's intense study of the human psyche yields an impressive cinematic work.

writers: Arthur Schnitzler (inspired by the novel by)
